title: PSP Essentials: Perm Crack 1+2000, Plugins, Emu, Games & Mor
description:
***See READ THIS FIRST!!!.txt for simple 3 step instructions to CRACK your PSP!***

***IMPORTANT!*** 

*** This is for PSP 1000 and PSP 2000 Models ONLY! Some of the later 2000 model PSP's introduced motherboards that cannot be cracked permanently. Custom firmware can still be used, but extra files are needed that are not included here. *** 

[ http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/PSP/Motherboards ] 

is a guide to PSP motherboards. Yours should be TA-088v2 or earlier. 

If your model PSP has a TA-088v3 or higher motherboard, DO NOT USE this method to crack your PSP. ***


** This Torrent's intended purpose is to make it easy to permanently install PRO Custom Firmware to your PSP 1000 and 2000 Models with some basic useful plugins and Themes already installed and working. ** 

cxmb.prx (allows .ctf Custom Theme Files to modify xmb) (9 .ctf Themes included)

umd_dump.prx (rip umd's to .iso by pressing home on UMD icon in xmb)

boost.prx (for boosting speaker volume) 

hold.prx (hold switch in xmb turns screen off and underclocks the cpu)

dayviewer.prx (allows custom display for date/time/battery%/timeleft etc.)

psppowersaver.prx (extends battery life by turning off umd, etc when not used)

simplebatteryviewer.prx (shows battery% and timeleft in game Home screen)

popsloader.prx (hold SELECT to load PSX eboots in any version of pops)

satellite_game.prx (vsh menu to shut down, set cpu clock, etc in game)

FuSa_SD.prx (displays game video on a TV using any video cable)

**I also included : 30 PSP games in Compressed ISO Format (.cso) , 15 Playstation Games in EBOOT.PBP format , snes9x euphoria Super Nientendo Emulator and Roms , gpSP Kai 3.4 test 3 Build 92 GameBoy Advance Emulator and Roms Galaxy Wars Portable, Doom Emu, with all WAD files(load one W at a time to memory stick), Hexen Emu with WAD, Heretic Emu with WAD,** 


All the included games were were downloaded from Emuparadise. 

[ http://www.emuparadise.me/Sony_Playstation_Portable_ISOs/List-All-Titles/44 ] 

and 

[ http://www.emuparadise.me/PSX_on_PSP_ISOs/List-All-Titles/67 ]

I had to unrar them and then unrar the part files and then compress them into .cso format. That is why I also included the Uniextract and PSP ISO Compressor installers in this Torrent.
